categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Berow was a female Human Sith Lord of the Sith Empire living during the Cold War and the apprentice of Darth Serevin. Residing on Tatooine in Mos Ila, she asked an Imperial working for commander Vilos to destroy any Jawas that proved to be Force-sensitive.
Lord Berow first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011.
She is only accessible to Imperial players in the game on Tatooine.
